quote: It's good to cry a bit, 'cause that helps us get through the rough parts. And the winter is though, there's no doubt. But we just hang on until spring when that ache will be all but swallowed up.
quote_letters: ITS GOOD TO CRY A BIT CAUSE THAT HELPS US GET THROUGH THE ROUGH PARTS AND THE WINTER IS THOUGH THERES NO DOUBT BUT WE JUST HANG ON UNTIL SPRING WHEN THAT ACHE WILL BE ALL BUT SWALLOWED UP
